main event: On 15 June 1954, a glowing light was observed at Patrick Air Force Base, Florida, which approached an aircraft landing light before hovering and then disappearing suddenly.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 25 feet in diameter and appeared solid, with no visible fins or appendages., It was first noticed about 100 yards to the east of the observation point., The object was described as being approximately twice the size of the moon., Investigation revealed no other aircraft or balloons in the area during the sighting., The object was observed hovering over the field for a short time before it vanished.
sighted object: a glowing light or solid object
witness description: No specific witnesses were mentioned, but observations were made by personnel at Patrick AFB.
